summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Indicates whether a DVD title is a karaoke title. This enumeration is a member of the structure, which is filled when an application calls the method.

member.name: DVD_TITLE_APPMODE.DVD_AppMode_Not_Specified
member.summary: The disc does not provide any application mode information about this title.

member.name: DVD_TITLE_APPMODE.DVD_AppMode_Other
member.summary: Title contains a type of content that the DVD Navigator Filter does not recognize, so the application should treat the title as a regular DVD-Video title.
